content: Mental Health Care is important and a real issue in every society. There is the burden of stigmatization which goes with mental illness for those diagnosed, and that in my opinion is heartbreaking. To be ill and victimized is an unkind and unpleasant reality many have to live with. I can attest to this on behalf of my mother and others diagnosed with the illness. What defines a society is not how rich it is in financial and other material resources only, but its ability to love and care for those in need. Thanks for this outstanding post David B. Grinberg
